NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Pharmaceuticals and Epidemiology or the cell corresponding to Telemedicine and Quality?

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Clinics and Patient Satisfaction or the cell corresponding to Policy and Prevention?

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Research and Prevention or the cell corresponding to Wellness and Prevention?
